analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#151-153) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#249-288)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#365-388)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#477-496)
	- generate_token_for (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#707-719)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#558-562) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#299-317):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#314-315)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#315-316)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#589-605) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#604)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#526) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#569-570)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#558-562)
	- /unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#561-562

ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#61)
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/47/0x158813d43fa4d02443a2d783f2a3ed0e2bb42a09.sol#122-123)
